title: Yasuo is Broken
body: Please delete yasuo of the game his wind barrier is fcing dumb and requires no skills

replies.body: He's not fun to play against but not broken.

> [{quoted}](name=ChromaSpell,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sP8pVzpP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-18T21:10:10.040+0000)
>
> He's not fun to play against but not broken.

Sometimes he is fun to play against because you can smash him in lane if you are smart enough :)

you know, the simple fact that post like this keep popping up several years after Yasuo came out kinda proofs that there is a problem with that champ. you'd say that over 2 + years people would have found a way to counter him.

fact is that if you don't counterpick him, you're in for a bad time.
Why not learn to play against yasuo instead of burning all your abilities on his highly predictable, long cooldown wind wall?

He's not broken. I honestly think they should have just taken away the damage reduction on PD for melees. Or increase the price of PD. It's too cost efficient for what Yasuo gets out of it, especially considering his double crit passive

> [{quoted}](name=i hate lol XD,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sP8pVzpP,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-18T21:05:47.264+0000)
>
> Please delete yasuo of the game his wind barrier is fcing dumb and requires no skills

your argument is dumb and requires no skills
